summary: EDM is a popular music genre made for dancing and listening in clubs, raves, and festivals. DJs mix different songs together to create a continuous flow of music. It started in the late 1980s and became very popular in Europe. In the US, it was more underground, mainly in certain cities. Over time, EDM gained global popularity, especially in the 2010s, and the term "EDM" was used to rebrand American rave culture. It includes various styles like dance-pop, house, techno, and more.
title: Electronic dance music
